Description: 
------------------- 
Kung Fu Panda 2 is the sequel to the blockbuster, Kung Fu Panda. In an original story, players are immersed in a video game to the final climactic battle at the end of the film between the Master Shen Po. Players must help Po, the Furious Five on the advice of respected teacher, Shifu, and the ox Croc defeat the plundering wolves, gorillas, and the powerful clans of savage Komodo dragons Xaio Gongma lead Dan to save the city, restore balance and, of course ... Save Kung Fu. 

Only Xbox 360 Po Kinect teach key players kung fu moves and train for the upcoming battle against the new, never before seen enemies, co-developed by THQ and DreamWorks Animation.
